EmailTemplate.description: Template for Change of Outlet Name
EmailTemplate.name: PC Level 2 - Change of Outlet Name
EmailTemplate.subject: foodpanda: Change of Outlet Name
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Good day.
Thank you for reaching out to foodpanda.
We would like to inform you that we have changed your outlet name from <old name> to <new name> in our system.
Please do let us know if you have any other concerns.
Hope you have a great day ahead!
Regards, <Agent Name>
